attributes.action: clarify the legal position of high street banks in charging penalty fees over and above their administration costs when an overdraft limit is exceeded.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unfair and inflated bank charges are a source of constant worry to those unlucky enough to fall victim to them, and it is those on the lowest incomes who suffer most. With the "downturn" looming and considering the recent bail-out of major banks with taxpayers money, I feel it is time that the legality or otherwise of these charges should be clarified.
